text: 🚨 new report reveals the harsh reality of America's healthcare affordability crisis 💸🤕🏥 did you know that most Americans can only afford a max. monthly payment of $97 for out-of-pocket medical costs? 😱 preventive visits, prescription drugs, mental health care, and diagnostic testing are being skipped or delayed due to unaffordable costs 🤕💔 it's time for change! 🌟 PayZen is tackling this issue head-on with AI-powered solutions to make healthcare more accessible and affordable for all 💪🏼
